<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/build/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/mod.rs -->

An edge in a graph connecting two nodes.

Depending on the context this could represent a directed or undirected edge.

## Fields

* edge: 2x [`GraphNodeId`](../datatypes/graph_node_id.md)
